price: 147. Allah akopesa bino etumbu te soki bopesi ye botondi mpe bondimi naye. Mpe Allah atonda botondi azali moyebi.
arabic: مَّا يَفۡعَلُ ٱللَّهُ بِعَذَابِكُمۡ إِن شَكَرۡتُمۡ وَءَامَنتُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ شَاكِرًا عَلِيمٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: mā yafʿalu al-lahu biʿadhābikum in shakartum waāmantum wakāna al-lahu shākiran ʿalīman
